name: Caramel Rolls
author: Shirley Drury
instructions: Ingredients should be to warm yeast temperature. Dissolve yeast in water. Add milk, lump butter, sugar, egg and salt. Add 1 1?2 cup flour and mix well. Then, add 1 3/4 cup flour and mix by hand until dough is satiny. Let rise for 30 minutes. Then mix brown sugar, butter, corn syrup and cinnamon together. Pour in 9 x 13 pan. Drop dough by teaspoon into caramel mixture. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate over night. Bake at 350Â° for 15 minutes.
